arStrings.szText: "It seems Margrave is beset by evil on all sides."
Yes, darkness is all around us, threatening to close in at any moment. It is our struggle to keep it at bay, if only just barely.
unbothered. this is the way of things
Back when the Knights Penitent still patrolled these woods, they would construct great sanctified braziers to ward off evil.
musing about times past while busy with his hands, not even looking at the player
There is one not far from here. If you wish to help us push back the darkness, you could light it.
